pkgmetadata.longdescription: Snow Water Equivalent Modeling with the 'Delta.snow' and 'HS2SWE' Models and Empirical Regression Models // Snow water equivalent is modeled with the process based models 'delta.snow' and 'HS2SWE' and empirical regression, which use relationships between density and diverse at-site parameters. The methods are described in Winkler et al. (2021) doi:10.5194/hess-25-1165-2021, Magnusson et al. (2025) doi:10.1016/j.coldregions.2025.104435, Guyennon et al. (2019) doi:10.1016/j.coldregions.2019.102859, Pistocchi (2016) doi:10.1016/j.ejrh.2016.03.004, Jonas et al. (2009) doi:10.1016/j.jhydrol.2009.09.021 and Sturm et al. (2010) doi:10.1175/2010JHM1202.1.
